::KitKat::

She ran over to the lab and got a bucket water and ran into the main 
room and poured it on Terrorsaur. "I hope this helps." as she poured 
it on the acid burns.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Terrorsaur:
> 
> 
> Terrorsaur limped through the main section of the Predacon cave, 
> screaming. He franticly wiped at the acid droplets on his 
arms. "Get 
> it off! Get it off! It's melting my armor! Somebody! Help!"
